channel.title: [718] Client stuck at getting updates?
channel.description:
My friend gave me his 718 server, and I asked if I could use it. I changed all his IP stuff to my IP's.. I tried all of the following No-ip, my real IP, and my localhost IP, and NONE of them worked, when I ran the client, it just stayed at "Checking for updates 0%"
I also get this in the command prompt when I run the client "error_game_js5connect"
Can somebody please help me out here!

item.title: [718] Client stuck at getting updates?

I changed all his IP stuff to my IP’s… I tried all of the following
No-ip, my real IP, and my localhost IP, and NONE of them worked, when I ran the client, it just stayed at “Checking for updates 0%”

I also get this in the command prompt when I run the client
“error_game_js5connect”

Can somebody please help me out here![/quote]
aka its the cache…

item.title: [718] Client stuck at getting updates?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It’s because your client isn’t connecting to your server. Perhaps your Server is offline.

Read full topic
